com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.grammar.factory

Class GrammarFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gmarciani.gmparser.models.grammar.factory.GrammarFactory

  • public class GrammarFactory
extends java.lang.Object

    Grammar factory model.

    The grammar factory provides useful methods for correct grammar creation.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Giacomo Marciani
    See Also:
    Grammar, ProductionFactory

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Grammar create()
      Returns the new grammar.
      static GrammarFactory getInstance()
      Returns the instance of the grammar factory singleton.
      GrammarFactory hasProduction(Member left, Member right)
      Adds to the grammar the specified production, by its LHS/RHS members.
      GrammarFactory hasProduction(Production production)
      Adds to the grammar the specified production.
      GrammarFactory hasProduction(java.lang.String left, java.lang.String right)
      Adds to the grammar the specified production, by its LHS/RHS member, represented as a string.
      GrammarFactory hasProductions(Productions productions)
      Adds to the grammar the specified set of productions.
      GrammarFactory hasProductions(java.lang.String productions)
      Adds to the grammar the specified set of productions, represented as a string.
      GrammarFactory hasProductions(java.lang.String productions, java.lang.String memberSeparator, java.lang.String infixSeparator, java.lang.String productionSeparator, java.lang.String productionEnder)
      Adds to the grammar the specified set of productions, represented as a string, with the specified separators/markers.

      Sets the grammar axiom.
      GrammarFactory withEpsilon(java.lang.Character epsilon)
      Sets the grammar epsilon representation.

      • hasProductions

        public GrammarFactory hasProductions(java.lang.String productions)
        Adds to the grammar the specified set of productions, represented as a string.
        Parameters:
        productions - the set of productions, represented as a string.
        Returns:
        the instance of the factory singleton.

      • hasProductions

        public GrammarFactory hasProductions(java.lang.String productions,
                            java.lang.String memberSeparator,
                            java.lang.String infixSeparator,
                            java.lang.String productionSeparator,
                            java.lang.String productionEnder)
        Adds to the grammar the specified set of productions, represented as a string, with the specified separators/markers.
        Parameters:
        productions - the set of productions, represented as a string.
        memberSeparator - the LHS/RHS production member separator.
        infixSeparator - the production for same non terminal symbol separator.
        productionSeparator - the production separator.
        productionEnder - the end marker for the set of productions.
        Returns:
        the instance of the factory singleton.
